page.title: 07Home Appliances
page.content:
A Hoover has a handle and a bag on it. There is button on the top of the handle which turns it on. It is a brown button and I press the button sometimes. I like pressing the button and I do the hoovering sometimes for Mummy. I like hoovering. It has a little brush on the bottom and it sucks the dirt off the carpet into the bag.
My Mum uses the iron. First she gets the board and puts the legs down and then puts the plug in the power point. She gets the clothes out of the basket and puts the clothes on the board and turns the knob to the right heat and then presses hard on the clothes to get out all the creases.
